column4: I have a really wierd problem, after I've listened to/watch something, the music and/or video gets all mumbled, screechy and it starts to lag like crazy.
Didn't have this problem with my other user. Compiz is disable.
Only one user have video/audio lag problem?
Yes, atleast I didn't have this problem on the other user. Not 100% it's even an ubuntu-specific problem.
